entry.dcterms:description: data about children, satisfaction with subsidies provided by social policy, and the justness of distribution; willingness to change residence; Hungary, the condition and the role of Hungarian nation; immigration, political relations of Hungary

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
